H0.text: Friction to electrical energy is the kind of energy conversion that occurs after a candle is lit.

H1.text: Light energy to heat energy is the kind of energy conversion that occurs after a candle is lit.

H2.text: Mass to kinetic energy is the energy conversion that occurs after a candle is lit.

H3.text: Chemical energy to light energy is the energy conversion that occurs after a candle is lit.

A4.text: The combustion process of lighting a candle includes the release of light, heat, carbon dioxide and water vapor
